title: [Feature Enhancement] - Multi SSH - paste multiple lines or commands
author: Hyper64
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Copy multiple lines of text to the clipboard and paste them into Multi SSH to be sent to all selected SSH sessions at once.

## Current Behavior
Currently, no matter how many lines of configuration file you copy to the clipboard only one line is executed.  

Multi SSH command buffer limits input to one line of configuration or command at a time 

## Possible Solution
Implement a feature similar to Tera Term's Clipboard Confirmation window.  You can copy multiple lin...

comments.snippet:
I do this in MTPuTTY but would love to switch to mRemoteNG

Here is an example...
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44235289/73534891-32c79300-441a-11ea-8f33-598b9e32c396.png)

Please consider adding some of these features but at minimum, multi line support. 

**_(note, MTPuTTY does do script send but the other items described on my screenshot (variables, preview etc) are features that would multiply productivity hugely)_**
comments.author: Steve-Mcl
